p: The extracellular pH was measured by Shao et al.[43] method. The extracellular pH of F. sporotrichioides was determined by eutech pH meter. The fungal suspension 105 CFU/mL were added to 20 mL PDB and incubated in a moist chamber at 28°C ± 2°C for 2 days. The mixtures were centrifuged at 4000 g for 20 min, and the resulting pellet was collected, washed for 2–3 times with sterilized double-distilled water, and resuspended in 20 mL sterilized double-distilled water. After the addition of the MPE, the extracellular pH was determined.
